LimitedNumeric.pm

00001 ##########################################################
00002 #
00003 #  Implements a context in which numbers can be entered,
00004 #  but no operations are permitted between them.
00005 #
00006 #  There are two versions:  one a number with no operations,
00007 #  and one for fractions of integers.  Select them using
00008 #  one of the following commands:
00009 #
00010 #      Context("LimiteNumeric");
00011 #      Context("LimitedNumeric-Fraction");
00012 #
00013 #  There is also a third version, which is a strict fraction
00014 #  mode (not in the original num_cmp) where ONLY fractions
00015 #  can be entered (not decimals).
00016 #
00017 #      Context("LimitedNumeric-StrictFraction");
00018 #
00019 ##########################################################
00020 
00021 
00022 ##################################################
00023 #
00024 #  Minus can only appear in front of a number
00025 #
00026 package Parser::Legacy::LimitedNumeric::UOP::minus;
00027 our @ISA = qw(Parser::UOP::minus);
00028 
00029 sub _check {
00030   my $self = shift;
00031   $self->SUPER::_check;
00032   my $uop = $self->{def}{string} || $self->{uop};
00033   $self->Error("You can only use '%s' with (non-negative) numbers",$uop)
00034     unless $self->{op}->class =~ /Number|INTEGER|DIVIDE/;
00035 }
00036 
00037 sub class {'MINUS'};
00038 
00039 
00040 ##################################################
00041 #
00042 #  Divides can only appear between numbers or a negative
00043 #  number and a number
00044 #
00045 package Parser::Legacy::LimitedNumeric::BOP::divide;
00046 our @ISA = qw(Parser::BOP::divide);
00047 
00048 sub _check {
00049   my $self = shift;
00050   $self->SUPER::_check;
00051   my $bop = $self->{def}{string} || $self->{bop};
00052   $self->Error("You can only use '%s' between (non-negative) integers",$bop)
00053     unless $self->{lop}->class =~ /INTEGER|MINUS/ &&
00054            $self->{rop}->class eq 'INTEGER';
00055 }
00056 
00057 sub class {'DIVIDE'};
00058 
00059 ##################################################
00060 #
00061 #  Distinguish integers from decimals
00062 #
00063 package Parser::Legacy::LimitedNumeric::Number;
00064 our @ISA = qw(Parser::Number);
00065 
00066 sub class {
00067   my $self = shift;
00068   return "INTEGER" if $self->{value_string} =~ m/^[-+]?[0-9]+$/;
00069   return "Number";
00070 }

00073 ##################################################
00074 
00075 package Parser::Legacy::LimitedNumeric;
00076 
00077 #
00078 #  LimitedNumeric context uses the modified minus
00079 #  and removes all other operatots, functions and parentheses
00080 #
00081 my $context = $Parser::Context::Default::context{Numeric}->copy;
00082 $Parser::Context::Default::context{'LimitedNumeric'} = $context;
00083 $context->{name} = 'LimitedNumeric';
00084 
00085 $context->operators->set('u-' => {class => 'Parser::Legacy::LimitedNumeric::UOP::minus'});
00086 $context->operators->undefine(
00087    '+', '-', '*', '* ', ' *', ' ', '/', '/ ', ' /', '^', '**',
00088    'U', '.', '><', 'u+', '!', '_', ',',
00089 );
00090 $context->parens->undefine('|','{','(','[');
00091 $context->functions->disable('All');
00092 
00093 ##################################################
00094 #
00095 #  For the Fraction versions, allow the modified division, and
00096 #  make sure numbers used in fractions are just integers
00097 #
00098 $context = $Parser::Context::Default::context{Numeric}->copy;
00099 $Parser::Context::Default::context{'LimitedNumeric-Fraction'} = $context;
00100 $context->{name} = "LimitedNumeric-Fraction";
00101 
00102 $context->operators->set(
00103   'u-' => {class => 'Parser::Legacy::LimitedNumeric::UOP::minus'},
00104   '/'  => {class => 'Parser::Legacy::LimitedNumeric::BOP::divide'},
00105   ' /' => {class => 'Parser::Legacy::LimitedNumeric::BOP::divide'},
00106   '/ ' => {class => 'Parser::Legacy::LimitedNumeric::BOP::divide'},
00107 );
00108 $context->operators->undefine(
00109    '+', '-', '*', '* ', ' *', ' ', '^', '**',
00110    'U', '.', '><', 'u+', '!', '_', ',',
00111 );
00112 $context->parens->undefine('|','{','[');
00113 $context->functions->disable('All');
00114 $context->{parser}{Number} = "Parser::Legacy::LimitedNumeric::Number";
00115 
00116 ##################################################
00117 #
00118 #  For strict fractions, don't allow decimal numbers
00119 #
00120 $context = $context->copy;
00121 $Parser::Context::Default::context{'LimitedNumeric-StrictFraction'} = $context;
00122 Parser::Number::NoDecimals($context);
00123 $context->{name} = "LimitedNumeric-StrictFraction";
